**Dataset:** *worlds_fairs* -- Data about fairs/expositions held globally with data
on cost, attendance, location, type, etc. 

**Loading packages & dataset**
```{r}
##Load packages
library(tidyverse)
library(gtsummary)
library(here)

#Load dataset
world_fairs <- read.csv(here("./data/worlds_fairs.csv"))
```
